cold.name: Cold Constitution
cold.description: You tend to feel cold easily and may have lower energy. Your body thrives with warmth and nourishing foods.

foods.proteins: Lamb, beef, chicken, salmon, bone broth

cold.principle: Choose warming, cooked foods over raw and cold items.

heat.name: Heat Constitution
heat.description: You tend to feel warm or overheated. Your body prefers cooling, light foods and benefits from calming practices.
heat.principle: Choose light, fresh, cooling foods and avoid heating spices.

balanced.name: Balanced Constitution
balanced.description: You're in harmony! Your body adjusts well to different foods and environments. Focus on maintaining this balance.

foods.variety: Enjoy a diverse range of proteins, vegetables, fruits, and whole grains
foods.approach: Seasonal eating and moderation in all things

balanced.principle: Maintain harmony through variety, seasonal eating, and moderation.
